task.title: How to Request a Refund
task.shortdesc: If you were unsatisfied with your AirClassroom experience, you can take these steps to request a refund.

step.cmd: Under "My Reservations," find the payment information for the reservation you were unsatisfied with.
Click "Request Refund" at the bottom of the page.
Fill out the online form, and state the reasons for your unsatisfaction.

info.p: The approval or rejection of your request may take up to 10 business days.
If your request is approved, your money will be returned to your card within 3-5 business days.
